rooms.description: Serves as the entry point to the farmhouse, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy.
A spacious area designed with ample natural light and modern aesthetics for relaxation and family gatherings.
A functional dining space that overlooks the garden for a pleasant outdoor view.
An efficiently designed kitchen with an island counter and ample storage space.
Space allocated for laundry and additional storage, adhering to building norms.
A spacious balcony adjoining the living room for outdoor relaxation and view.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance designed to comply with local building norms and Vastu principles.
An accessible opening into the large garden area.
Floor-to-ceiling windows installed to maximize natural light and scenic views.
